text: Tarzan's Secret Treasure is a 1941 jungle adventure Tarzan movie. It is based on the fictional characters and concepts created by Edgar Rice Burroughs. The movie is the fifth of the six MGM Tarzan movies starring Johnny Weissmuller and Maureen O'Sullivan. Johnny Sheffield plays Boy. ==Story== Two crooks find out that there is gold in the jungle. They kidnap Jane and Boy in order to make Tarzan show them the location of the treasure. Everyone is captured by natives. Tarzan comes to their rescue. ==Related pages== *Tarzan Finds a Son!, prequel to this movie *Tarzan's New York Adventure, sequel to this movie ==Other websites== * Category:1941 movies Category:Tarzan movies Category:Jungle movies Category:Sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Thorpe Category:American adventure movies Category:American movies Category:American fantasy movies
title: Tarzan's Secret Treasure
